00039 static int l_com = 0;                              // COM port file descriptor
00040 static termios l_saved;            // structure with saved terminal attributes
00041 static fd_set l_readSet;  // file-descriptor set for reading COM port and term
00042 static int l_maxFd;                    // maximum file descriptor for select()

00045 bool comOpen(char const *comName, int baudRate) {
00046 
00047     l_com = open(comName, O_RDWR | O_NOCTTY | O_NONBLOCK);// R/W, non-blocking
00048     if (l_com == -1) {
00049         return false;                                           // open failed
00050     }
00051 
00052     struct termios t;
00053     if (tcgetattr(l_com, &t) == -1) {
00054         return false;                             // getting attributes failed
00055     }
00056     t.c_cc[VMIN]  = 0;
00057     t.c_cc[VTIME] = 1;
00058 
00059     t.c_iflag = 0;
00060     t.c_iflag &= ~(BRKINT | IGNPAR | PARMRK | INPCK |
00061                    ISTRIP | INLCR | IGNCR | ICRNL | IXON | IXOFF);
00062     t.c_iflag |= IGNBRK;
00063 
00064     t.c_oflag = 0;
00065     t.c_oflag &= ~OPOST;
00066 
00067     t.c_lflag = 0;
00068     t.c_lflag &= ~(ECHO | ECHOE | ECHOK | ECHONL |
00069                    ICANON | ISIG | NOFLSH | TOSTOP);
00070 
00071     t.c_cflag = 0;
00072     t.c_cflag &= ~(CSIZE | HUPCL);
00073     t.c_cflag |= (CLOCAL | CREAD);
00074 
00075     speed_t spd = B115200;                        // the speed of the COM port
00076     switch (baudRate) {
00077         case    200: spd =    B200; break;
00078         case    300: spd =    B300; break;
00079         case    600: spd =    B600; break;
00080         case   1200: spd =   B1200; break;
00081         case   1800: spd =   B1800; break;
00082         case   2400: spd =   B2400; break;
00083         case   4800: spd =   B4800; break;
00084         case   9600: spd =   B9600; break;
00085         case  19200: spd =  B19200; break;
00086         case  38400: spd =  B38400; break;
00087         case  57600: spd =  B57600; break;
00088         case 115200: spd = B115200; break;
00089         default: assert(0); break;                    // unsupported baud rate
00090     }
00091 
00092     // parity
00093     t.c_cflag &= ~(PARENB | PARODD);                              // no parity
00094     //t.c_cflag |= (PARENB | PARODD);                            // odd parity
00095     //t.c_cflag &= ~(PARODD);                                   // even parity
00096     //t.c_cflag |= (PARENB);                                    // even parity
00097 
00098     // bits in a byte
00099     //t.c_cflag |= (CS7);                                  // 7 bits in a byte
00100     t.c_cflag |= (CS8);                                    // 8 bits in a byte
00101 
00102     // stop bits
00103     t.c_cflag &= ~(CSTOPB);                                      // 1 stop bit
00104     //t.c_cflag |= (CSTOPB);                                  // 1.5 stop bits
00105 
00106     if (cfsetispeed(&t, spd) == -1) {
00107         return false;                            // setting input speed failed
00108     }
00109     if (cfsetospeed(&t, spd) == -1) {
00110         return false;                           // setting output speed failed
00111     }
00112     if (tcflush(l_com, TCIFLUSH) == -1) {
00113         return false;                              // flushing the port failed
00114     }
00115     if (tcsetattr(l_com, TCSANOW, &t) == -1) {
00116         return false;                              // seting attributes failed
00117     }
00118 
00119     // modify the terminal attributes
00120     if (tcgetattr(0, &l_saved) == -1) {  // get the original terminal settings
00121         return false;                             // getting attributes failed
00122     }
00123     if (tcgetattr(0, &t) == -1) {        // get the modified terminal settings
00124         return false;                             // getting attributes failed
00125     }
00126     t.c_lflag &= ~(ICANON | ECHO);          // disable canonical mode and echo
00127     if (tcsetattr(0, TCSANOW, &t) == -1) {
00128         return false;                              // seting attributes failed
00129     }
00130 
00131     FD_ZERO(&l_readSet);
00132     FD_SET(l_com, &l_readSet);   // set the COM port to be checked in select()
00133     FD_SET(0, &l_readSet);       // set the terminal to be checked in select()
00134     l_maxFd = l_com + 1;
00135     return true;
00136 }

00138 void comClose(void) {
00139     tcsetattr(0, TCSANOW, &l_saved);    // restore the saved terminal settings
00140 
00141     if (l_com != 0) {
00142         close(l_com);                                    // close the COM port
00143         l_com = 0;
00144     }
00145 }

00147 int comRead(unsigned char *buf, size_t size) {
00148     fd_set readSet = l_readSet;
00149 
00150      // block indefinitely until the COM port or the Terimal have intput ready
00151     int n = select(l_maxFd, &readSet, 0, 0, NULL);
00152 
00153     if (FD_ISSET(0, &readSet)) {     // any intput available from the Termial?
00154         return -1;                                                // terminate
00155     }
00156     if (FD_ISSET(l_com, &readSet)) { // any input available from the COM port?
00157         n = read(l_com, buf, size);
00158     }
00159     return n;
00160 }
